verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> thy face <WH6440> toward <WH413> Jerusalem, <WH3389> and drop <WH5197> thy word toward <WH413> the holy places, <WH4720> and prophesy <WH5012> against <WH413> the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478>

And say <WH559> to the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD; <WH3068> Behold, <WH2009> I am against <WH413> thee, and will draw forth <WH3318> my sword <WH2719> out of his sheath, <WH4480> <WH8593> and will cut off <WH3772> from <WH4480> thee the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked. <WH7563>

Seeing then <WH3282> that <WH834> I will cut off <WH3772> from <WH4480> thee the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked, <WH7563> therefore <WH3651> shall my sword <WH2719> go forth <WH3318> out of his sheath <WH4480> <WH8593> against <WH413> all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> from the south <WH4480> <WH5045> to the north: <WH6828>

That all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> may know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have drawn forth <WH3318> my sword <WH2719> out of his sheath: <WH4480> <WH8593> it shall not <WH3808> return <WH7725> any more. <WH5750>
Sigh <WH584> therefore, thou <WH859> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> with the breaking <WH7670> of thy loins; <WH4975> and with bitterness <WH4814> sigh <WH584> before their eyes. <WH5869>

And it shall be, <WH1961> when <WH3588> they say <WH559> unto <WH413> thee, Wherefore <WH5921> <WH4100> sighest <WH584> thou? <WH859> that thou shalt answer, <WH559> For <WH413> the tidings; <WH8052> because <WH3588> it cometh: <WH935> and every <WH3605> heart <WH3820> shall melt, <WH4549> and all <WH3605> hands <WH3027> shall be feeble, <WH7503> and every <WH3605> spirit <WH7307> shall faint, <WH3543> and all <WH3605> knees <WH1290> shall be weak <WH1980> as water: <WH4325> behold, <WH2009> it cometh, <WH935> and shall be brought to pass, <WH1961> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
Again the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy, <WH5012> and say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD; <WH136> Say, <WH559> A sword, <WH2719> a sword <WH2719> is sharpened, <WH2300> and also <WH1571> furbished: <WH4803>

It is sharpened <WH2300> to <WH4616> make a sore slaughter; <WH2873> <WH2874> it is furbished <WH4803> that <WH4616> it may glitter: <WH1961> <WH1300> should we then <WH176> make mirth? <WH7797> it contemneth <WH3988> the rod <WH7626> of my son, <WH1121> as every <WH3605> tree. <WH6086>

And he hath given <WH5414> it to be furbished, <WH4803> that it may be handled: <WH8610> <WH3709> this <WH1931> sword <WH2719> is sharpened, <WH2300> and it <WH1931> is furbished, <WH4803> to give <WH5414> it into the hand <WH3027> of the slayer. <WH2026>

Cry <WH2199> and howl, <WH3213> son <WH1121> of man: <WH120> for <WH3588> it <WH1931> shall be <WH1961> upon my people, <WH5971> it <WH1931> shall be upon all <WH3605> the princes <WH5387> of Israel: <WH3478> terrors <WH4048> by reason of <WH413> the sword <WH2719> shall be <WH1961> upon <WH854> my people: <WH5971> smite <WH5606> therefore <WH3651> upon <WH413> thy thigh. <WH3409>

Because <WH3588> it is a trial, <WH974> and what <WH4100> if <WH518> the sword contemn <WH3988> even <WH1571> the rod? <WH7626> it shall be <WH1961> no <WH3808> more, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

Thou <WH859> therefore, son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy, <WH5012> and smite thine hands together, <WH5221> <WH3709> <WH413> <WH3709> and let the sword <WH2719> be doubled <WH3717> the third time, <WH7992> the sword <WH2719> of the slain: <WH2491> it <WH1931> is the sword <WH2719> of the great <WH1419> men that are slain, <WH2491> which entereth into their privy chambers. <WH2314>

I have set <WH5414> the point <WH19> of the sword <WH2719> against <WH5921> all <WH3605> their gates, <WH8179> that <WH4616> their heart <WH3820> may faint, <WH4127> and their ruins <WH4383> be multiplied: <WH7235> ah! <WH253> it is made bright, <WH6213> <WH1300> it is wrapped up <WH4593> for the slaughter. <WH2874>
Go thee one way or other, <WH258> either on the right hand, <WH3231> or on the left, <WH8041> whithersoever <WH575> thy face <WH6440> is set. <WH3259>
I <WH589> will also <WH1571> smite <WH5221> mine hands together, <WH3709> <WH413> <WH3709> and I will cause my fury <WH2534> to rest: <WH5117> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have said <WH1696> it.
The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me again, saying, <WH559>

Also, thou <WH859> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> appoint <WH7760> thee two <WH8147> ways, <WH1870> that the sword <WH2719> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> may come: <WH935> both twain <WH8147> shall come forth <WH3318> out of one land: <WH4480> <WH776> <WH259> and choose <WH1254> thou a place, <WH3027> choose <WH1254> it at the head <WH7218> of the way <WH1870> to the city. <WH5892>

Appoint <WH7760> a way, <WH1870> that the sword <WH2719> may come <WH935> to <WH854> Rabbath <WH7237> of the Ammonites, <WH1121> <WH5983> and to <WH854> Judah <WH3063> in Jerusalem <WH3389> the defensed. <WH1219>

For <WH3588> the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> stood <WH5975> at <WH413> the parting <WH517> of the way, <WH1870> at the head <WH7218> of the two <WH8147> ways, <WH1870> to use <WH7080> divination: <WH7081> he made his arrows bright, <WH7043> <WH2671> he consulted <WH7592> with images, <WH8655> he looked <WH7200> in the liver. <WH3516>

At his right hand <WH3225> was <WH1961> the divination <WH7081> for Jerusalem, <WH3389> to appoint <WH7760> captains, <WH3733> to open <WH6605> the mouth <WH6310> in the slaughter, <WH7524> to lift up <WH7311> the voice <WH6963> with shouting, <WH8643> to appoint <WH7760> battering rams <WH3733> against <WH5921> the gates, <WH8179> to cast <WH8210> a mount, <WH5550> and to build <WH1129> a fort. <WH1785>

And it shall be <WH1961> unto them as a false <WH7723> divination <WH7080> in their sight, <WH5869> to them that have sworn <WH7650> oaths: <WH7621> but he <WH1931> will call to remembrance <WH2142> the iniquity, <WH5771> that they may be taken. <WH8610>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> ye have made your iniquity <WH5771> to be remembered, <WH2142> in that your transgressions <WH6588> are discovered, <WH1540> so that in all <WH3605> your doings <WH5949> your sins <WH2403> do appear; <WH7200> because, <WH3282> I say, that ye are come to remembrance, <WH2142> ye shall be taken <WH8610> with the hand. <WH3709>
And thou, <WH859> profane <WH2491> wicked <WH7563> prince <WH5387> of Israel, <WH3478> whose <WH834> day <WH3117> is come, <WH935> when <WH6256> iniquity <WH5771> shall have an end, <WH7093>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Remove <WH5493> the diadem, <WH4701> and take off <WH7311> the crown: <WH5850> this <WH2063> shall not <WH3808> be the same: <WH2063> exalt <WH1361> him that is low, <WH8217> and abase <WH8213> him that is high. <WH1364>

I will <WH7760> overturn, <WH5754> overturn, <WH5754> overturn, <WH5754> it: and <WH1571> it <WH2063> shall be <WH1961> no <WH3808> more, until <WH5704> he come <WH935> whose <WH834> right <WH4941> it is; and I will give <WH5414> it him.

And thou, <WH859> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy <WH5012> and say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> concerning <WH413> the Ammonites, <WH1121> <WH5983> and concerning <WH413> their reproach; <WH2781> even say <WH559> thou, The sword, <WH2719> the sword <WH2719> is drawn: <WH6605> for the slaughter <WH2874> it is furbished, <WH4803> to consume <WH3557> because of <WH4616> the glittering: <WH1300>

While they see <WH2372> vanity <WH7723> unto thee, while they divine <WH7080> a lie <WH3577> unto thee, to bring <WH5414> thee upon <WH413> the necks <WH6677> of them that are slain, <WH2491> of the wicked, <WH7563> whose <WH834> day <WH3119> is come, <WH935> when <WH6256> their iniquity <WH5771> shall have an end. <WH7093>

Shall I cause it to return <WH7725> into <WH413> his sheath? <WH8593> I will judge <WH8199> thee in the place <WH4725> where <WH834> thou wast created, <WH1254> in the land <WH776> of thy nativity. <WH4351>

And I will pour out <WH8210> mine indignation <WH2195> upon <WH5921> thee, I will blow <WH6315> against <WH5921> thee in the fire <WH784> of my wrath, <WH5678> and deliver <WH5414> thee into the hand <WH3027> of brutish <WH1197> men, <WH376> and skillful <WH2796> to destroy. <WH4889>

Thou shalt be <WH1961> for fuel <WH402> to the fire; <WH784> thy blood <WH1818> shall be <WH1961> in the midst <WH8432> of the land; <WH776> thou shalt be no <WH3808> more remembered: <WH2142> for <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it.
